about_the_game:
New technologies mean new threats: Viruses are now sentient and the Antiviruses of old are no longer effective. As Astro-Fox, your goal is to build the ultimate antivirus in order to erradicate the viruses from your computer before they overrun it.

RogueVirus is a grid-based game with elements from bullet-hell and roguelike genres. Dodge relentless attacks from your enemies and strike them with a wide variety of commands to delete them. 

                         

KEY FEATURES:

  • Grid-based combat in real-time: The game is played on a board composed of up to 21 cells in which you have to quickly move to dodge attacks and ambush enemies.

  • Dozens of unique attacks and upgrades: Collect powerful commands to make your own antivirus and upgrade it using add-ons to gain new properties.

  • Rule-breaking enemies: Not all viruses are the same, some of them will completely ignore the rules of the game taking you off-guard if you're not careful!

  • Randomly generated levels: Each level is composed of multiple random sectors for you to explore in order to find items, stores or even allies.
